channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- 3DPrint Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- 3DPrint Lite

item.title: CVE-2021-4436|2024-07-17T14:46:22.110Z -- unknown -- 3dprint%20lite
item.description: The 3DPrint Lite WordPress plugin before 1.9.1.5 does not have any authorisation and does not check the uploaded file in its p3dlite_handle_upload AJAX action , allowing unauthenticated users to upload arbitrary file to the web server. However, there is a .htaccess, preventing the file to be accessed on Web servers such as Apache.

item.title: CVE-2021-4436|2024-07-15T20:36:43.256Z -- unknown -- 3dprint%20lite
item.description: The 3DPrint Lite WordPress plugin before 1.9.1.5 does not have any authorisation and does not check the uploaded file in its p3dlite_handle_upload AJAX action , allowing unauthenticated users to upload arbitrary file to the web server. However, there is a .htaccess, preventing the file to be accessed on Web servers such as Apache.
